scripts.clone:isithometimeyet: rm temp/ -rf && git clone https://github.com/jonifen/isithometimeyet temp/isithometimeyet/ && cp -r temp/isithometimeyet/vanilla-js public/isithometimeyet
scripts.clone:cakes: rm temp/ -rf && git clone https://github.com/jonifen/cakeable-offence temp/cakes/ && cp -r temp/cakes public/cakes
scripts.build: hugo && npm run clone:isithometimeyet && npm run clone:cakes
